title: How to Become a Cloud Architect
headline: In this free online course, you will learn about cloud architect, how become one and advance your career.
description: Cloud architects are IT specialists that supervise the cloud computing strategies of companies that use cloud services. They are basically responsible for bridging the gap between business challenges and cloud solutions. You'll learn about the concept of cloud architecture, the reasons to become a cloud architect and the skills required. You will explore cloud architect training and coaching options, how to ace interviews and more.
courseDescription:
Cloud architecture otherwise known as cloud computing architecture is the complex design of components and subcomponents required for cloud computing (i.e using a network of remote servers that is hosted on the internet to store, manage and process data instead of a local server or personal computer). Cloud architects are IT professionals that come up with cloud computing strategies that include adoption plans, application design, management and monitoring. They serve as a link between business challenges and cloud solutions. In this course, we show you the road map to becoming a successful cloud architect and advancing your career. We kick off by introducing you to the concept of cloud architecture and its roles in an organization. Following that, we’ll show you the reasons for becoming a cloud architect and the routine tasks of cloud architects.

To become a cloud architect you’ll need to have background knowledge in cloud computing and other similar technical areas. This course comprehensively highlights the top skills that you must master in order to become a successful cloud architect. Furthermore, we analyze the various career paths that you can steer into on your way to becoming a cloud architect. We also provide helpful tips for becoming a cloud architect without any prior experience. Have you ever wondered how much cloud architects make per year or month? This is a great question and we answer that by examining the salary ranges for both entry-level and experienced cloud architects. On top of that, we’ll show you the various cloud architecture training options that are available as well as their benefits and their importance. 

Next, you'll learn about coaching options in cloud architecture and techniques to help you ace an interview. Explore the role of LinkedIn in job search, how to architect high-level solutions from an on-prem environment to an AWS environment and the importance of certifications and more. Technology is getting complex, data is becoming bulky necessitating proper storage and management. Also, businesses are rapidly moving to the cloud. As a result of this, cloud architects are in high demand because they are at the cutting edge of technology. This course is designed for all learners including programmers, software and cloud engineers who want to break into the cloud computing field. So if you want to head down a career path in cloud architecture and make a difference in the tech industry, enroll and start this course today!
